website_summaries.verdict: This model offers high definition picture-in-picture and bright spot reduction technology along with built-in WiFi, making this a good family camcorder for use in capturing outdoor events.
pros: Wi-Fi feature makes sharing among family members easy
Bright spot reduction technology eliminates glare for viewers during playback of outdoors events like birthday parties or baseball games
20x zoom technology is powerful enough when combined with the full HD picture to capture important details clearly
5-axis balancing gives users a stable picture, even when capturing a lot of motion
cons: Camera icons remain visible during streaming playback on WiFi

customer_reviews.title: Broke down in two months, no help from customer service
customer_reviews.text: Within two months of purchasing the camera, I received an error message on the LCD screen that said ERROR OCCURRED. PLEASE TURN UNIT OFF, THEN TURN ON AGAIN. However, all camera buttons were frozen so I couldn't do anything. I had to remove the battery to turn the camera off but even then, when I turned it back on--same error message. So after dealing with awful customer service, I have to mail the camera to Panasonic's service center and wait to see whether they are going to send me a refund, refurbished camera, or whatever else. Hey Panasonic--it's 2017, you products should do what they say for more than two months.
customer_reviews.author: MHungerford

customer_reviews.title: Horrible picture quality coming direct out of cameraI to a 4k tv
customer_reviews.text: We set this camera up observe another room during study sessions in our lab. We have done this with half a dozen other cameras over the years. We installed it and instantly recognized that the picture quality out was much worse than the 1080p Panasonic camera it was replacing. The color quality, details, and dynamic range were either the same or not nearly as good. We had the camera hooked up via HDMI to a 4K Samsung TV. The build quality felt cheap, the camera felt cheap and was super light..but not in a good way. We returned it, super disappointing because we love our other Panasonic cameras and wanted to move to 4K.
customer_reviews.author: JasonNova

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for price
customer_reviews.text: Needed to record a drama play in low light and after 3 times testing settings found the correct low light setting I needed and could not have been happier, it's great in low light
customer_reviews.author: Applianceguy14

customer_reviews.title: Poor video quality/ cheap made
customer_reviews.text: The video quality was terrible, I have an old HD JVC camcorder that has just as good or better quality. The image stabilization does not appear to be working or just is not that good. Camcorder is plastic and feels cheap made. The wifi connection is terrible sometimes it will not let me connect my phone. Some of the 4k editing would not work, I am very disappointed with this camcorder and have returned it. The manual that came with it and the one on line does not cover all of the features so you have to figure those out yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy H.

customer_reviews.title: Better then GH2 in low light.
customer_reviews.text: Used to record classroom in room with incandescent lights (low light). And low light is brilliant! Even better then with GH2 when studio light was shining on front of class. However you need to set settings for low light: Shutter 1/30 (NOT 1/60 else will be terrible in low light). Auto Slow Shutter ON (else 1/30 option won't enable). And "Backlight Compensation" should always be set ON (it turns off automatically when camera is off, but other settings stay permanent).
customer_reviews.author: Thisthat

customer_reviews.title: No image captured
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure if it’s just mine but this thing is a a dud. When you turn it on, it takes about five minutes for it capture an image and start working properly. During these five minutes, it will capture audio, but no video. I’m not sure what the issue is and I can’t seem to fix it. I should have wrote this review much sooner, but I just forgot all about this thing until now when I need to use it. Do your research and consider other options.
customer_reviews.author: Yerda

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful until it died
customer_reviews.text: This was great for both high quality video and still pictures, but 15 months after purchase it suddenly died. Panasonic was no help. Warranty is good for 12 months, not 15 months. Seems like a $500 camcorder should last longer than this and Panasonic's lack of backing for their product says they know it won't last. And they follow that with don't attempt to repair it yourself even though they won't repair or service it.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Munger

customer_reviews.title: This camera is good.
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. Small enough to put in my pocket, but powerful enough to handle any situation. I love my DSLR but I'm a video camera guy. I got this to record the Baja Rally in Mexico last year for Steve Hengeveld and it kicked ass. Shoots great photos. Image stability is awesome. I love the manual wheel. Slow-mo looks great. Not too much to complain about with this camera. You might want to go with the 4k version if you can afford it just because that's where everything is going (and beyond). If not, this camera will do you just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Tazz Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camcorder to do family documentaries to post on youtube. I bought this camcorder to replace a sony cam that wasn't quite doing what I wanted. The video quality and anti shake is way better. I like it so far and it is easy to use. You will want to buy extra larger batteries and the hood that goes with the cam. Audio is really good but you will want an external mic with a dead cat for windy days. I give the cam a grade of A.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Video noise.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible noise. No not the audio. The mic is fine for an internal mic, I mean the noise you see on the video. Not sharp at all. It looked fine on the camera. Once you put it on screen, it has so much noise and looks terrible. I tried correcting it on FCP but it was just bad. Equals to a cheap cellphone "HD" video. Not good at all if your going to watch it on a TV screen.
customer_reviews.author: APrime Tower

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera, Stock Battery is Weak.
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera, I use it for recording my Robotics team's matches. The Panasonic Wide angle lens is almost a must for this camera, helped me get closer to the fields while seeing all the action. Battery life is pathetic, I keep a 20Ah external battery in my camera bag at all times, there are larger batteries for sale and I'd highly advise that you consider that when buying.
customer_reviews.author: Cory B.

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. I love its size, function and quality. My only negative is the finish on the body, I prefer a glossier look, a minor item for sure. I love the built in video light, I love its low light sensitivity, the fact you can do time lapse video, or slow motion. I really love the "Instant On" feature. For the money, this camera is tough to beat.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Foley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our son's soccer games
customer_reviews.text: It was very hard for me to find the "right" camcorder that I wanted to record his games so that he could produce his highlight videos. This one does the trick. I would like to be able to remote it or get it up a lot higher, but the battery life and quality is second-to-none. I would recommend this if you are a parent trying to help your kids do videos for high school, club or college sports.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Does not support external field monitor when recording.
customer_reviews.text: I bought an HDMI field monitor and was disappointed to learn that the camera does not support it when recording. It would have been nice to know that fact before I bought the monitor for it. The camera comes with the HDMI out cable that goes into a standard HDMI monitor but only works for playback, not during recording. When I am in the field I want to mount the 5.6” monitor on my tripod so I am not looking at the camera’s small LCD screen and guessing at exposure or color. I would not have purchased this camera if I knew it did not support an external monitor during recording.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressive
customer_reviews.text: This camcorder is excellent. I has many more features than I will probably use but it's good knowing they are there if I do. Picture quality is excellent. I purchased a Alvoxcon wireless headset lavalier mike to go with it. Initially it did not work. After I noticed that the plug that goes into the mic jack on the camcorder was a 4-wire (T-R-R-S) jack, I got an adapter to a 3-wire (T-R-S) plug. Works fine now. If you buy a wireless mike with a 4-wire plug, you can get a Rode SC-3 adapter from B&H Photo Video online.
customer_reviews.author: Richard K. Barber- W7OLA

customer_reviews.title: After 3 months, headache comes....
customer_reviews.text: In the beginning, it performed well. After 3 months, problems arose: 1.It continues to double save my files, so every video I take has two twin files, taking up a lot of space. So annoying! 2.SD cards come into errors: one's file is undone, one turned unusable. And I had to buy new SD cards. 3. I bought it in Hong Kong from Amazon.com. I just found that overseas warranty is not included. Shipping back to the US is no help. I regret I did not read the fine print before making purchase. Now I have to seek advice from their technical support department, another ordeal to endure. Hopefully they will answer my query.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great for filming sports
customer_reviews.text: I mostly use this to film my kids' sports events. The zoom is amazing; I can get good detail from across a stadium, and the slow motion feature is nice to have for fast moving events. Battery life is just OK, enough for a couple of games, which works out as long as you remember to recharge it overnight.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wortham

customer_reviews.title: Needed this a lot sooner.
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera! I've been working with an old 8mm camera for years, which did a great job for what I was doing, but I wanted something newer. The 4K is great, much better than what I was used to. The 1080p and 1080i is also a great match for this unit. I love the remote camera and being able to connect my smartphone to the camera and get a picture in a picture when recording video. The sound quality is great as well. I love this camera and wish I had it a long time ago. I could go on talking about this camera all day. It is well worth the money!!! Pictures coming.
customer_reviews.author: Beez

customer_reviews.title: Great cameras for church video production on a budget.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these Panasonic HC-V770 Camcorders for my church. I have them hard mounted on either side of my stage for video capture of our worship and sermons. They have been absolutely perfect for what I needed them to do. Using HDMI over LAN cables to run the video back to my mixing board. The color reproduction is quite faithful and they pick up great sound as well. The price was perfect as well!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda T

customer_reviews.title: Great for Filming Bands
customer_reviews.text: I needed a camera or camcorder that filmed fairly well in low light. I film bands with the ZS 70 and FZ 80. These work great in the daytime or at night when the stage has good lighting. In dim lighting ----I use this camcorder. Works really good. I am adding a video I just filmed after the sun had set in a concert-in-the-park. I was 200 feet away and the camcorder did a great job capturing the band. Watch the video and see how I zoom in. I do not even use 4k just 1080p so I don't fill up the SD car. I recommend this camcorder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like now that I have read the instructions and practiced using it.
customer_reviews.text: I have a chance to slowly learn how to use this video camera. So I am taking back my 2 star review and upping it up to a 5 star. I will say if you are one of those out there that does not like to read the instructions (thats me) then this one may be hard for you. My only recommendation to Panasonic is to post more HOW TO videos and instruction on the the operations of the unit. It takes amazing video clips / footage.
customer_reviews.author: tjones

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with this camcorder
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this camcorder. It has exceeded my expectations. The software upload instructions are not very clear. I haven't taken time to look at the editing capabilities of the software. I can't tell about the 4K video as I don't have a TV with 4K capabilities. The operation is fairly easy to learn enough to record video, take pictures and download pictures and video to a computer. If the computer has a DVD or Blu Ray recorder the data can be downloaded to the computer in that format. There is a larger battery for this camcorder Panasonic P/N VW-VBT380 listed as an option in the owner's manual.
customer_reviews.author: Terri L MacKay

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for a good quality Full HD video camera for a while. I have bought and returned several that were absolute junk. This camera is well built and high quality. We use it in conjunction with our Church's video ministry. We are always happy with the quality of the recording.
customer_reviews.author: BJ Hall

customer_reviews.title: Value and quality for money
customer_reviews.text: Very good camera for the price. I am satisfied with the picture quality and I was able to use the WiFi to connect my smart phone to the camera. However, when I did that the camera signal dropped from the Blackmagic ATEM television studio HD
customer_reviews.author: Bedi

customer_reviews.title: Touchscreen Sucks
customer_reviews.text: Right now I am very frustrated with the touch screen. I am having to hit everything multiple times to get anything to work. Adding my wifi password was a pain in the neck and I am considering sending this back. For $600 I expect more.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Small but professional
customer_reviews.text: I do paparazzi professionally and this is camera we use. Daily our footage get used from this camera on Entertainment TV Shows.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Michael Arnoldi

customer_reviews.title: We haven't been disappointed! It captures our sons (we have three all ...
customer_reviews.text: We needed a new camcorder to film our sons sporting events so it needed to be able to record fast action well. After countless hours of research we decided on this one. We haven't been disappointed! It captures our sons (we have three all heavily involved in soccer) in a nice clear and crisp video while they are playing a game. One thing I've noticed is occasionally the flash turns on and I can't seem to turn it off without powering it off then on again. Other than that we have been very satisfied with this camcorder.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: The Adobe software no longer comes with it, and it is NOISY
customer_reviews.text: There was supposed to be Adobe editing sofware you could download, but that ended a year before I bought (which I didn't find out until I bought it). More important, though, is the fact that it is noisy! When I did a video, you could hear the camera under the external sound.
customer_reviews.author: Acter

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely terrible camera
customer_reviews.text: Very poor camera. Picture quality is not good. My phone can take better videos. But the biggest complaint is all the features. You're supposed to be able to connect the camera to your phone or computer via WiFi or Bluetooth. Never works. Despite connecting to the camera with my phone, the app never recognizes it's connected. The app you need is absolutely worthless. Do yourself and your wallet a favor and buy any other camera on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Too much money. Too complicated.
customer_reviews.text: Too complicated and too expensive for a hand held. Way too much of a learning curve. Crowded, confused screen and controls. Not ergonomic to handle. Video quality is below average for the investment. Battery life seems short as well. Not even a nice try. It will shoot video though.
customer_reviews.author: James McAllen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is a really good camera. It has a powerful zoom and a very clear picture. I have been using this camera for several years now and have been very impressed. I am a fire prevention / public information officer for a wildland fire agency and use this camera to get video of wildfires which has been used in training videos and shared / used by media outlets. The only downside to this camera is that the battery life isn't as long as I would like it to be...but an extra battery and a charger fixes that problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 9 months
customer_reviews.text: Was a great camera when it worked. But after about 9 months it suddenly decided that the USB port doesnt need to work anymore. I now have no way to get my videos off of the device.
customer_reviews.author: Chewd

customer_reviews.title: Good 4K Camera
customer_reviews.text: I've filmed several basketball games in 4K. They came out really well; a big improvement in quality over my cell phone (Samsung S7). I had to record three games in a row one day so I connected the camera to an external USB power pack (attached to my monopod) and it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Jason A

customer_reviews.title: Great Camcorder
customer_reviews.text: I can not compare this Camcorder with other products, since this is the first one I have owned. I got tired of the Video function of my Canon EOS 6d and decided to spent the money on a camcorder. This one seems to be of excellent quality. The videos are comparable with the results of my much more expensive EOS 6d. Easy to use, very small and light. With the remote function it can be controlled by a smart phone which is a nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: Manfred

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camcorder
customer_reviews.text: I love this camcorder! I bought this to replace my old Canon HF100 camcorder, which was showing signs of age. The picture is beautiful! I love the zoom options (1500x zoom is fun to play with) and the image stabilization is amazing. I also like the ability to do manual exposure settings for tricky situations like recording my kids' performances in a dark auditorium with stage lighting. The menus are a bit unintuitive but oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Overly smart camcorder rejects after-market batteries
customer_reviews.text: HC-VX981K. Not my first Panasonic camcorder. Performs very well, as expected, except for rejecting after-market (Probty brand) batteries. My loss: US$60. Forewarned is forearmed.
customer_reviews.author: Miles Odonnol

customer_reviews.title: I thought it was just a movie camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camcorder for my granddaughters dance recital. Not being familiar with the device, I was not able to make good use of it that evening. With practice, I came to better understand its operation. To my surprise, it is great for still picture and has a superior zoom feature. Just came back from a vacation and cannot wait to see the pictures I took. I am a fan so far.
customer_reviews.author: V F

customer_reviews.title: struggles at moderate light condition images are noisy
customer_reviews.text: Camera captures moving subjects smoothly. The camera struggles in moderate light conditions. Still images are comparable to a lower level camera. If you have proper lighting which is not always possible it has potential.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Good value for price
customer_reviews.text: Great little camcorder for the price. It doesn't look like much by size, but I'm really pleased with the video it produces and the functionality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Wisdom

customer_reviews.title: It is ok not great
customer_reviews.text: It is a pretty good camera for home videos. I got this to launch my sports highlight channel. I thought the quality would be better but it is pretty good. It was a struggle to find out how to turn the auto light off but I figured it out. I want to upgrade to bigger and better. This camera will get the job done I just want the more professional look to my videos.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Hunt33

customer_reviews.title: Not a great choice and no info on this before you buy
customer_reviews.text: Decent camera if all you want to do is record. This camera boasted streaming, however you cannot remove icons during live streaming from HDMI cable. Not a great choice and no info on this before you buy. Just beware, not a great streaming camera.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Mildren

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, I want to marry it.
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, love this camera. I am getting amazing footage with this thing. Filmed graduations with this and took on my recent trip to Italy. This is some top quality footage. Some noise in very low light (very low light, like dark).
customer_reviews.author: Patrice

customer_reviews.title: ... the video sensor but the audio input is not good, it buzzes and maxes out easy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the video sensor but the audio input is not good, it buzzes and maxes out easy, do not use with externals. Where is the audio display to see levels while shooting? Not sure if this camera has a defect or they are all like this. Wish I'd bought something else.
customer_reviews.author: d.w

customer_reviews.title: Shop around! Never worked
customer_reviews.text: Went to use the camera for my granddaughters birthday and camera wouldn’t work. This was the first time I tried to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Funk

customer_reviews.title: This camera is awesome. The misses and I both really like it
customer_reviews.text: This camera is awesome. The misses and I both really like it. just big enough to fit in one's hand. very compact, great resolution on the fold out display. the panasonic phone app works as advertised for PIP filming and remote control. Battery life is decent, picture quality is amazing. low light recording looks great. the mic is excellent. all an amateur needs...
customer_reviews.author: Jon P Allen II

customer_reviews.title: Works for my needs at church!
customer_reviews.text: I film Church events and classes this camera works very well. I had actually bought two other cameras before this one so when I say this one works best... it works best...
customer_reviews.author: CLR

customer_reviews.title: I wish color night mode was less jerky.
customer_reviews.text: Replacement for identical cam that was hit with a laser... Love this little cam... (with 2 extended batts).
customer_reviews.author: Justjager

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for basic video needs
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 6 of these for my company so we could film training seminars and events. The quality of image isn't where I'd like it to be, but it gets the job done and is simple enough to use that our training managers with no filming experience are able to capture content themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Adina

customer_reviews.title: not what was advertised
customer_reviews.text: expected a unit that was remote control capable, found that it has to be connected thru Wi-Fi & that method is extremely unstable and difficult to navigate, immediately sent it back
customer_reviews.author: dave berthold

customer_reviews.title: Small but powerfull
customer_reviews.text: This looks like a little no nothing camera but it produces very clear video. I am very happy that I went with a name brand and not some of the knock off brands available.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Ames

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Good Product, but cant support webcam or live streaming, you can used HDMI Video capture to live streaming with OBS Or XSplit
customer_reviews.author: Marlam Z.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent video camera
customer_reviews.text: This 4K video camera is to replace my older Canon HD video camera. This is an excellent camera (both video and picture). The video and picture images are of great quality. The video zooming in and out are very smooth even on the stage afar from the balcony. The USB charge cable is a big plus as I can plug into my portable USB charger for longer video shooting. Taking pictures while videoing is no issue.
customer_reviews.author: David C.

customer_reviews.title: Internal Mic Headache
customer_reviews.text: Internal mic cannot be turned off when you wish to simply use an external mic.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Camera works great. Now if I could just remember to bring it.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Loucks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing picture quality. Took it to yellowstone and the images were breath taking
customer_reviews.author: john carter

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to film our church services. This camera is up to the task. Very clear and crisp video. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: So it looks just like the VX870 and accepts the same batteries
customer_reviews.text: I have an older HC-VX870 that was having shutter problems so I ordered VX981K. So it looks just like the VX870 and accepts the same batteries. Great that I don't have to get new backup batteries and accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Hawaiian

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this Panasonic 4K This video cámara is very portable and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: walter Forever

customer_reviews.title: All the comparisons are great and the manual options work well
customer_reviews.text: Remarkable camera. All the comparisons are great and the manual options work well. You need to play with the settings as some are there in name only it seems. Maybe they do something but I certainly cant tell. Ones I used are so much better than other hand helds in this class. Pictures and video sharp and clean.
customer_reviews.author: jonathon

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful all around.
customer_reviews.text: Christmas day videos in less than bright light are outstanding. Sound is very clear. Having a second battery is helpful. The standard battery lasts about 90 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Cognizant Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great family camera if you’re looking for good quality but don’t want to spend the money for 4K
customer_reviews.text: This camera is perfect if you want good-quality sound and picture but don’t want to pay for 4K. It also works much better in low-lighting than a phone camera. We use it for home videos of our son, and it’s great! I’m not techy so I can’t speak to specifics, but my husband is fairly techy and he loves it and is very pleased with the quality. Just for use as a family camera, we’re happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Blankenbeckler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for a non-professional.
customer_reviews.text: This camera is so easy to use, I did upgrade to a cordless lapel microphone, simply for sound quality in the work I’m using it for. Shoots a great picture.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Camcorder is used to record and post church worship services on social media. I like picture quality and the zoom feature.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Nice video camcorder!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly was I was looking for in video, beautiful images for sure. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: angel pomales

customer_reviews.title: IMPERFECT CAMCORDER
customer_reviews.text: I’m used the 4K mode to record on class 10 64 gb SDXC card,but when playback,it happens froze for half second the end of clips,between every clips,but if I use the AVCHD,MP4 mode to record that’s no problems ,the pictures is good and clear,that’s imperfect 4K camcorder.
customer_reviews.author: an d.

customer_reviews.title: Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: This product gives quality video. However, it was a little more complicated than I thought it would be for a beginner like me. You need to do your research before you buy.
customer_reviews.author: nate demo

customer_reviews.title: Very nice camcorder
customer_reviews.text: This camcorder is great, I just wish that they were offering the inclusive packages that I see out there now. A lot of retailers offer a boat-load of accessories with this camcorder for the same price. Check around for great deals.
customer_reviews.author: icaras

customer_reviews.title: Thumb down for low light
customer_reviews.text: Night time and low light footage quality are not as good as they say. Tons of video noise. Yes it better then my 12 years old Panasonic camcorder but quality are unuseable, I test the 4k and 1080, play them on my 75 inch 4k tv. I couldn't tell the different, dont really know both at 1080 level or 4k level. I should have bought the sony. Oh yeah no editing software like they say.
customer_reviews.author: QT

customer_reviews.title: Best Camcorder Ever
customer_reviews.text: If you know how to get the settings right and handle this beast. This is like the best Camcorder Ever. With a novice like me this camera just proved way too good. Cinema Quality video is true to the dot.
customer_reviews.author: Rajesh

customer_reviews.title: Nice Camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for online streaming as well as everyday video recording. The quality is amazing. So far, no problems at all.

customer_reviews.title: Purchased new item, received used item
customer_reviews.text: Item was open boxed, item had been used and returned. Packaging was not well restored to original state. Item appears to have been sold as new, but used product. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Julio Miranda

customer_reviews.title: After a year record button went off...........
customer_reviews.text: i am missing the record button ... really for this class of camera it just felt off somewhere ............. how could it be?

customer_reviews.title: small size makes it easy to take with you
customer_reviews.text: takes a decent video. small size makes it easy to take with you, not a burden. easy to operate. just download the manual and read it. i would definitely buy another one if this disappears.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: its awesome because its nice and clear I would buy this camcorder again its nice and it also has a touch screen which I like and also it has a microphone jack so I can use my microphone
